input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Tanning salon treatment has a direct effect on black hair. Going to the beach has a direct effect on black hair. For people not using tanning salon treatments, the probability of black hair is 58%. For people who went to tanning salons, the probability of black hair is 18%. Will tanning salon treatment increase the chance of black hair?
